synopsis:
New Aria work produced for the "Ao no Curtain Call" project to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the broadcast of the first Aria TV series.

Aria The Avvenire was previewed in theaters in Japan on September 26, 2015. It will be released in three parts with the Blu-ray Boxes of Aria The Animation, Aria The Natural, and Aria The Origination.
title: Aria The Avvenire
